body.name: Tangkula Bathroom Storage Cabinet, Freestanding Wood Single Door Side Floor Cabinet with Adjustable Shelf, Small Bathroom Cabinet for Small Spaces, for Bathroom Living Room (White)
features: 【Ample & Flexible Storage Space】Featuring 1 open shelf and 1 single-door cabinet, the floor cabinet provides ample space to store your daily items like towels, shampoo, tissues or decorations, making your room neat and tidy. Besides, the 3-position adjustable inner shelf allows you to store items with different heights.

【Thoughtful Details & Wide Application】The floor storage cabinet features a magnetic catch to help you close the door tightly with low noise. Moreover, thanks to its compact and lightweight design, you can place this floor cabinet anywhere in your home – bathroom, living room or entryway to add more storage space.

【Simple & Modern Home Decor】Exquisitely designed with simple style and modern white finish, the floor storage cabinet can fit well with any home decor and is a perfect addition to brighten up your living space. The delicate round knob allows you to open and close the cabinet door with ease, while adding a sense of elegance.

【Sturdy Structure & Selected Materials】Crafted from thick and durable MDF with exquisite workmanship, this bathroom floor storage cabinet ensures great stability and load capacity for long-lasting use.

【Easy to Assemble & Maintain】With smooth surface, this bathroom cabinet is easy to clean. What's more, this bathroom floor cabinet comes with detailed instructions for you to finish the assembly work easily and quickly.
body.description: DescriptionOur floor storage cabinet will make your living space organized and elegant! Made of high quality MDF with waterproof paint, this bathroom floor cabinet is pretty durable, stable and easy to clean. The spacious tabletop, open shelf and single-door cabinet provide large storage space for your various items, such as books, towels, decorations and other daily items. Besides, the shelf behind the cabinet door can be adjusted to 3 heights for placing different items. Featuring a simple and modern design, this floor storage cabinet with white finish can fit well with any home decor. What's more, this floor cabinet can be used not only as a storage cabinet for the bathroom, but also as a bedside table or a coffee table in the living room.FeatureAmple space to store your daily items, toiletries and decorationThickened wooden structure ensures great stability and durability Inner adjustable shelf with 3 heights to meet different storage needsHumanized round knob helps you to open the door with easePainted surface is smooth and waterproof for easy cleaningMagnetic door holder to better fix the door with low noiseSimple and modern design fits well with any home styleWidely used in the bathroom, living room, entryway, etcEasy to assemble with detailed instructionSpecificationColor: WhiteMaterial: MDFProduct Dimension: 16" x 12" x 27.5" (L x W x H) The Dimensions of Cabinet Door: 14'' x 17.5''(L x H) Net Weight: 16 lbsWeight Capacity of Top Panel: 44 lbs Weight Capacity of Each Shelf: 22 lbs Package Includes：1 X Bathroom Floor Cabinet1 X Instruction

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All-around fine product
reviews.reviewText: This product came very well packaged. Assembly was easy and instructions were very good. A very nice product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for small space storage and looks good.
reviews.reviewText: perfect for small space storage and looks good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am well pleased with it.
reviews.reviewText: I liked all of it - no problems!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine for what it is but pretty cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: I know it is cheap furniture that I shouldn’t expect much from, and that’s what you get. It is fine for what it is but basically disposable after a couple of years of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: This cabinet fit nicely in a tiny spot of our (full) bath and it matches our (white) medicine cabinet. We were looking for somewhere to allow guests to set things... toiletry bag, hair-dryer, etc. The top candle will be moved when we have over-nighters. I bought some small (cloth) baskets for storage so this is exactly what I was looking for. Easy to assemble but has a strong-ish odor for a few days. I used the exhaust fan and it's gone now. (Note - the door does clear the side of the cabinet with an inch to spare.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Piece of crap
reviews.reviewText: First let me say this is a cute cabinet that fits PERFECTLY in my half bath…BUT when assembled the door will not open fully. See photos. If the door is opened to the fully open position the cabinet pulls apart and becomes rickety, see photos. WHAT THE H**L??!! I spent 30 minutes of my time assembling this storage cabinet and I want to actually store things in it. If I can not open the door, how am I supposed to get anything in it? Total waste of my time, money and effort!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble if you’re used to IKEA. Not heavy duty, but serviceable and looks good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The cabinet is the exact size I needed. The finish is perfect. Disappointed in the hardware, very small for a door that will be opened frequently. Could not open and close the door once assembled. Needed to purchase different hinges in order for the door to operate properly.
